EmailTemplate.name: Renewal - PDH audit notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Department of Licensing - We are auditing your {!MUSW__License2__c.Credential_Type__c} professional development hours. You must send us proof by {!MUSW__License2__c.Days_Before_License_Expiration_21__c}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
LICENSED SUBMITTED Hi {!MUSW__License2__c.Applicant_Full_Name__c},
Your application is currently under review. We will reach out directly with any questions.
Thanks & Regards, Washington Department of Licensing
